benchmark_details.name: SurgPub-Video
benchmark_details.overview: SurgPub-Video is a comprehensive surgical video dataset composed of over 3,538 surgical videos and 25 million annotated frames across 11 specialties, designed to enhance vision-language model performance in surgical scene understanding and to support video-level Visual Question Answering benchmarks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a large-scale, video-based surgical dataset for enhancing the capabilities of Vision-Language Models in understanding surgical procedures and support VQA.

data.annotation: Manually annotated with comprehensive VQA pairs and surgical concepts

methodology.calculation: Metrics evaluated based on video-level comparisons and VQA pair matches
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of the model in understanding and answering surgical questions.
methodology.baseline_results: SurgLLaV A-Video outperformed general-purpose models with 82.84% overall accuracy.
methodology.validation: The evaluation metrics include overall accuracy and specialty-task specific accuracy.
